tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Under Dr. Chavvi's guidance, I was able to reduce my HbA1c levels significantly. Her detailed instructions on medication, dietary adjustments, and exercise routines were clear and easy to follow. Regular monitoring and adjustments to my treatment plan ensured continuous progress. My HbA1c dropped from 9.6 to 6.4 demonstrating the effectiveness of her approach.

I‚Äôm very impressed with the service at the Sugar.fit diabetes clinic in HSR Layout. The health counsellors, Misba, and operations manager Akhilesh, have been incredibly supportive and professional, offering excellent guidance and care. The clinic is always clean and well-maintained, thanks to the dedicated housekeeping staff. Their attention to hygiene adds to the positive experience at the center. Thank you to the entire team for your exceptional service!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently finished Sugarfit's diabetes reversal programme, guided by Dr. Chavvi Mehra, and the results have been nothing short of life-changing. When I started the programme, my HbA1c values were shockingly high at 8.5%. After following the personalized plan by the Doctor, health coach and the dedicated team, my HbA1c values have reduced to an outstanding 5.7%. This huge improvement has improved both my health and my entire quality of life.

The Sugarfit personnel deserve special recognition. They are really supportive, ************* and always willing to help with any questions or issues. ` Their encouragement and expertise have made the major change in my health.

The clinic is in excellent condition. It is well-equipped with modern amenities and offers a welcoming and pleasant atmosphere. Appointments are well-organized, resulting in short wait times and a seamless overall experience. 

To summarize, I strongly suggest Sugarfit's diabetes reversal programme to anyone wishing to control and potentially reverse their diabetes. Its combination of professional medical advice, supportive staff, and outstanding facilities sets it apart.
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback. Your insights and suggestions are greatly appreciated and will help us to improve our work.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I took my 75 year mother to dr. Chhavi with a list of varied different symptoms which even my mother was not able to understand or articulate correctly.  The previous doctor had suggested various tests including PET scan and did not inspire any confidence in me.  Even though all the tests were negative she was convinced that my mother had cancer.

Dr. Chhavi clearly understood and bucketed the various symptoms into the underlying causes *** ******** *** ***** ******** *** *****  She explained the reasons patiently and clearly .  She did not prescribe any new tests or unnecessary medicines. 

After meeting dr. Chhavi , I am so relieved.  I would recommend the doctor to everyone.

tags: None
review:
*** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****** ** ********** Her Diagnosis is very straight forward and to the point. She don't waste people time and money. 
Very friendly and good human being as she not only prescribes medicined but motivate her patients for healthy lifestyle also. 
Most importanly the medicines she recommended gave me relief to great extent within 2 weeks. Again I went for follow up and now very much satisfied with her treatment.

review: I was unwell for 3 months, had done two courses of strong antibiotics (based on incorrect diagnoses by other doctors) and was overall in pretty bad health before a colleague recommended Dr. Chhavi to me. She listened to all my symptoms patiently, ********* ** ********* and directed me to the appropriate specialist for treatment. I underwent surgery to address the health issue and my health has been perfect since. I was scheduled to move out of the country shortly after consulting her, and it wouldn't have happened if not for Dr. Chhavi, so much gratitude to her. We need more doctors and human beings like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had got typhoid and treated with 7 days of medicines from other doc. Aft a week, i got stomach ache. So went to meet this doctor. He really guided me very nicely saying you were not diagnosed properly, and u dnt have typhoid. Its just gastric problem. 
And i started to take his tablets but still stomach ache was there and i got diagonozed by other doctor and found its kidney stones and gastric problem. I never got typhoid, totally i was diagonozed wrongly. 
Overall i can say I am satisfied and he is friendly, patience, even gave his contact no to call anytime.
